## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 35,000                                   |
| Rationale                         | To account for demand variability, lead time, and maintain a safety stock. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Higher than player's planned order by 5,000 units. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 1.3                                      |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 7.2                                      |
| Comments                          |  Purchasing 35,000 units ensures coverage for the forecasted demand and provides a buffer for potential fluctuations. This order size utilizes the available vendor order quantities efficiently and avoids exceeding the shelf life. |
